results.content:
Le nom du cours c'est Aurelia, mais il semble que la plupart du contenu n'est pas concernant Aurelia, mais javascript (non ES5, non TS, mais JS). On sait qu’Aurelia est un Framework différent que permet d’utiliser nos connaissances de javascript etc, mais il y a plusieurs courses de javascript gratuit. Maintenant j'ai passé la moitié du course et j'ai regardé une seul vidéo à propos d'Aurélia, presque inutile parce que les tutorielles officielle d'Aurelia contiennent tous ce que j'ai vu ici!
Je vais d'abord essayé de finir le course e voir s'il y a quelque chose d’utile.

results.content: The course was listed as "advanced". So far the videos have been very "Dick and Jane"; that is to say my eight year old with zero programming experience is able to follow them.
results.content_html: The course was listed as "advanced". So far the videos have been very "Dick and Jane"; that is to say my eight year old with zero programming experience is able to follow them.

results.content: The course title indicates this is an advanced Aurelia course.  Looks like at least half of the course doesn't touch Aurelia, and so far the level of information is pretty low.  Also the noise gate on the vocals is too hash, leaving the guy sounding like a robot with a stutter.  Disappointed so far.
